song.title: Neon Village
song.info:
Neon Village
- by -
RabiteMan / Pulse Music
My first official release as a member of Pulse Music. Enjoy! Pulse Web page: http://www.wco.com/~trudell/pulse
Special thanks to those of you whose samples I have ripped... Sorry, but their origins have been forgotten...
Greets to:
Schoop tACK PlagueFox Sach Vector Pup CaRnAgE Grogstr Neel Overfiend Liljen necros iv
...and to High Kaliber (friend to Pulse Music!),
Mickrip, for making Warm Rain, the awesomest IT mod ever,
the Hornet Archive, for supplying me with all the latest mods and demos, http://www.hornet.org
and to all my friends on AOL and IRC (AOL and IRC in the same sentence??)...
Write to me: rabite@rain.org rabiteman@aol.com
